scripts.release: (cd lambda && cargo lambda build --release) && (cd website && npm ci && npm run build) && (rm lambda/build -rf && rm lambda/dist -rf && mkdir -p lambda/build/public && mkdir -p lambda/dist) && (cp lambda/target/lambda/lambda/bootstrap lambda/build/ && cp -r website/dist/* lambda/build/public) && (cd lambda/build && zip -qr ../dist/out.zip .) && npm ci && npm run build
